At home, I could not spend much time with my friends because of all the training, so that was not a big change for me. I got used to my new life, and my English got better quickly!
I became a professional player at eighteen, three years after arriving in the USA. I had been taller than most players since I was fifteen, but I needed to gain weight to play well. My coach knew a team that would take me while I was still in college, so I joined them and have never regretted it."

"Seven years ago, I was studying Tourism at college. I needed a part-time job because my course was expensive. I decided to become a weekend tour guide in my home city, Chicago, USA. I took visitors around the city and was surprised at how much I enjoyed it. I saw my city in a new way every time! After I finished my studies, I wanted to be a tour guide full-time. I thought it would be easy, but I learned that I needed to know a lot more to get a licence. All tour guides in Chicago must answer many questions about the city, like its history and public transport rules. After some hard but interesting months, I got my tour guide qualification and became an independent tour guide.
Being a tour guide is not just about knowing facts. You also need to be entertaining and tell interesting stories. It is important to handle different situations, like if a place is closed when you arrive or if the route changes. Tourists want to enjoy their tour, not hear about problems. I need to make sure visitors are happy, or they might leave a bad review online. Good reviews are very important because they help attract more customers. I try to make my tours fun and easy. Because of my enthusiasm and energy, I usually get very good reviews, and many visitors recommend my tours to others coming to Chicago."

"My name is Ella, and I am 22 years old. Last year, I went to Thailand for two weeks with my sister, Josie. She is five years younger than me, but we get along well. We went to help at an elephant sanctuary. This is a place where people take care of sick and rescued elephants. At first, I was not sure if we would have things in common with the other volunteers because they were older than us. We were also nervous because it was our first time doing this kind of work. In the end, we had nothing to worry about. 
One of our main jobs at the sanctuary was to collect food for the elephants. Elephants eat a lot of grass and banana plants, so this took most of the day. Josie found it hard work, but I thought it was worth it to see the elephants enjoy their food. We also helped wash the elephants in the river with big brushes and soap. I had a lot of fun, even if I got wetter than the elephants!
The part of the day I looked forward to the most was the evening. By the light of the moon, we led the elephants into the forest where they spent the night. All the volunteers stayed in the same house. Josie and I shared a bedroom, so we did not have much space. We chose to do this because Josie did not want to be alone. It was hot and humid, especially at night, but we expected that. The meals were delicious and did not have meat, which we do not like. 
After dinner, all the volunteers and staff spent the evenings talking and playing games. Now that we are back in the UK, Josie does not often talk about Thailand. But if someone asks her if she enjoyed her time at the sanctuary, she says she loved it. I think she might be a little upset with herself because she missed her friends too much. But when she thinks back, she can see how lucky she was to go there. Maybe she will go back one day – I know I will!"

"My name is Gina D’Costa, and I have a flower shop in the UK. We sell flowers to many different customers. Hotels and offices often buy flowers for their reception areas. Sometimes, we provide flowers for businesses to use in their advertising photos. Once, I decorated a castle with flowers for a wedding. It was a lot of work, but I was very proud of it. 
My day starts at 4 a.m. when I go to the market to buy fresh flowers. Most people are still asleep, and my friends think I am crazy, but I love my job. It is often cold and dark at that time, but I don’t let it bother me. The flower market is amazing, with flowers from all over the world. It can be hard to choose flowers because there are so many beautiful ones. My favorite color is pink, so I would choose pink flowers for myself. But I have to remember that other people may want different flowers. 
Not all flowers are available all year, so I sometimes cannot find what customers want. I don’t like arguing about prices with the flower sellers, but I have to get the best price. Flowers can be expensive, so I try to save money when I can. 
Back at the shop, we look at customer orders and prepare vases with the flowers I bought. Then, we make flower bunches and calculate the costs. Customers are often surprised by the prices, and I sometimes ask them to think again about what they want. Some people may think this is too much work, but I enjoy finding the best flowers for the money someone wants to spend. That is what you do when you sell things – I wouldn’t want any other job!"

"My city has a modern cinema that shows all the latest films and many films for kids on weekends. It is close to my home, but a year ago, I felt something was missing. I wanted to talk about a film in detail with other people after watching it. So, I started a film club with two friends! We decided not to rent a cinema. Instead, we choose a different place in the city each month. For example, we used an old factory to show a film set in Antarctica. It was very cold, which made it perfect for the film, and it was great! Some places we use are free because the owners sell snacks during the film. This helps us keep our prices low. We are happy to cover our costs and not make a profit. Each time we show a film, it gets easier for us, especially now that we have our own good equipment. We can see how many tickets we sell online, so we don’t worry about empty seats! There is always a lot to do, but when people of all ages tell us they had a great time, it feels wonderful. Our website helps us a lot, and we are now in touch with other film clubs in the country. We have visited them to see how they do things, but it is always nice to come back to our own club! We also started a blog because most people look online for film information instead of reading local papers. We have put up some posters in cafés, but the best way to get people to come is by word of mouth – when friends tell each other about us. The audience loves the fun activities we have with each film. Last month, we had a movie quiz that everyone enjoyed."

"Taking photographs was my favorite activity when I was a child. When I was 15, I wanted to make my hobby better. So, I decided to start a special project: I would take one photograph every day for a whole year. Many other young photographers had done this before, but I thought it was a great idea, so I began. After a few weeks, I put my photos on a website for young photographers. I wanted to create a photo diary and show my photos to others. I was surprised to find that many people liked my photos. I enjoyed taking pictures of many different things. Then, someone suggested that I should have a common theme for my photos. I agreed and started to focus on nature, especially birds and the sky. Most of my photos were black and white, which was different from what other young photographers were doing, as they took color photos. Sometimes, I doubted my project and almost gave up. But in the end, I trusted myself and became more confident in my style. One day, I showed my project to my art teacher. She told me about a photography competition for young people. I entered some of my photos just for fun. I will never forget when the judges told me I won first prize. I was so happy because my project meant a lot to me. It was the first time I realized that my photography was good, and I could be a professional photographer. Now, I have my own photography studio, and I am happy with my career choice."

"I joined the National Youth Challenge (NYC) last year because I wanted to try new things like camping and sailing. In the NYC, you can do different activities to challenge yourself and learn new skills. There are levels from beginner to advanced, and adult volunteers called ‘leaders’ help you. When you finish each level, you get a certificate.
When I first joined, my leader said I should help organize activities at a local children’s club for two hours a week. I was not sure about this because I had joined that club when I was eight, and I found it hard to make friends. I was shy, and the other children already had their own friends, so I stopped going after a few weeks. But I decided to take the challenge because I wanted my first NYC certificate.
Soon, I wanted to spend all my free time at the children’s club. It became more important to me than just getting the certificate. When I finished the challenge, the NYC leader let me keep volunteering at the club because I made good friends with the children. Now, I go there for about four hours a week, and I always look forward to it.
Because of what I learned at the children’s club, I decided that when I finish school in three years, I want to go to college to become a youth worker, someone who works with children. I had never thought about my future job before joining the club. This has been my favorite part of the NYC, and I have improved my communication skills while helping others. I have several NYC certificates now, and one of them is for camping!"

"I was born in Denver, USA. I started snowboarding when I was eight years old. My dad took me to a place in the mountains, about two hours from Denver. The hill looked very steep, so my dad had to convince me to try it. I was too young to ask him if I could snowboard, but he loved it and wanted me to enjoy it too. He made it look easy. In the end, I did well. After that, I loved snowboarding and got better at it. I started competing when I was ten. Some people do many competitions and get bored, but I still love to compete and win. This helps me work harder. I like not having a strict plan. Sometimes this works out well, like when I was the first girl to get a perfect score of 100 in a local competition. I was not sure I could do the jumps that got me this score until I tried. This made me trust my skills more. 
In the summer, I train and study because there is no snow. I train every day, but I don’t have to follow a strict diet like in winter. I also spend a lot of time with my friends. This helps me deal with not doing what I love. I think about my future. Snowboarding is a big part of my life, but I want to have another job in case I don’t become a professional snowboarder or if I get hurt. I am thinking about becoming a doctor if I have time to go to college. I can’t imagine getting tired of snowboarding, but I know I can’t do it forever."

'When I was fifteen, I wanted everything my friends had, and I never thought about the future. For example, I didn’t know what I wanted to do after school. One day, my best friend got a new phone for her birthday, and I wanted one too. My parents said I could only have it if I paid for it myself, so I decided to work part-time and save money. I am thankful to my parents for making me do that – it taught me an important lesson. I worked every Saturday in a café, but I didn’t enjoy it much, so my parents suggested I start my own small business. I had seen my mum making necklaces, so I asked if I could try that. I thought it would be hard, but it was easy. My friends thought it was boring, but I liked the idea. My mum showed me how to make something nice at home with simple tools and materials. I sold my first jewellery to my friends and family. They said they liked it, but I thought they were just being nice. I still needed to know if other people would like it too. So, I rented a market stall with my mum. There are many tourists where I live, and they bought a lot of my things to take home. Soon, we got calls from people all over the country who wanted to buy more. They thought we were a big company, but we were just two people at a market stall! That was when I knew it could work, and I decided to create a website. Since then, I have made a lot of money from my business, mostly online, but we still have our stall too. It has been a lot of fun!'

'When Janine Stuart was 13 years old, she wrote a book called Being Amelia. This book became very popular. Being Amelia is partly about Janine’s life. In an interview, Janine said, “Because my father’s job made us move a lot, I learned to make new friends. I know what it is like to be the new student in a class. This helped me write about Amelia, the main character, and her new school. Some funny parts of the book are about Amelia’s home life, especially her relationship with her older brother. I am an only child, so I had to use my imagination to write about that.” 
Janine started her book one summer when she was bored at home. Her mother wanted to be a writer, and her teachers encouraged her to write, so writing seemed like a good way to spend her time. The year before, she won a short story competition on a young writers’ website. That is why, when Janine finished Being Amelia and sent it to a publishing company, they were excited to read it. They loved it, and a year later, Janine’s book was in stores. 
One review of Being Amelia says that even though the cover has pictures of happy teenagers, the characters face some hard problems. This makes readers believe in them. The reviewer says that even though Janine is young and her book is not very long, she is a better writer than many other best-selling authors. Janine is still getting used to being a famous writer. She said, “At first, I hid when people recognized me in the street, but now it’s OK. I want to help other young writers, but they need to find what works for them. For me, I just need to spend time with my friends, and then I will have something interesting to write about!”'

"My name is Tom. I am fifteen years old. Three years ago, my family and I moved to a castle on a small island. My father was invited to be the manager of the castle. He works for a group that takes care of old buildings and keeps them open for visitors. He was happy to get this job, but it took time for the rest of us to agree. We were worried about life on the island. We thought the castle might not be as nice as our warm home across the water, and there was no school there.
After we moved, we got used to living on the island. The castle is not very beautiful, but our apartment is comfortable. In summer, the island is friendly and has many visitors. There are often parties on the beach. In winter, we only see the other families who live on the island, and there are not many teenagers. The adults help each other with work on the island, which can be hard.
The biggest change for me was taking a boat to my old school every day. I looked forward to going on stormy days when there are big waves, but the ferries do not run then! I also learned that if I miss the bus to the harbor after school, I miss the last ferry home, which is scary. So when my friends come to visit, I always tell them to hurry!
We often see beautiful views, especially when the sun sets over the sea. Some days, it is so foggy that you cannot see anything, but then it can be sunny again in a few hours. This still feels amazing to me, even after living here for a long time. We do have bad storms, and I sometimes wonder if the castle is strong enough to stay safe. But I remember it has been here for many years, and it is still standing!"

"I live in a house in the beautiful countryside of Scotland. I have always loved nature and wild animals. Six years ago, I started a new hobby – birdwatching! I went to the mountains in northern Scotland with my family. We saw many birds in their natural homes. I spent hours watching them with my parents. They taught me how to tell different types of birds apart and where to find them. It was amazing! After we came home, I joined a local birdwatchers’ club for young people. My goal is to see 200 different types of birds, and I am almost there. On family holidays, I have seen birds from other countries too. We always look for places with birdwatching activities so I can add new birds to my list! I have been to Egypt, and last summer we went to South America. I thought I would see my 200th bird there, but it didn’t happen. I learned that you need to be patient with this hobby. I made a video about my challenge and many teenagers liked it and said it looked fun. When my teachers saw it, they asked me to give a talk about birdwatching at school. I felt nervous before I went on stage. I knew what to say and had notes, but all my friends and the whole school were watching me! I relaxed when it was over, and the teachers said I did well. I might do another talk next year! I am lucky to live in the countryside. I understand why many teenagers in cities might not want to be birdwatchers, but there are many birds to see, especially in green areas. I think birdwatching clubs should try to get more young people interested in this hobby. Everyone should connect with nature, no matter how old they are, and it doesn’t have to cost a lot of money."

"I started playing football when I was 7 years old. I would hurry home from school to play with other kids. I loved it, and after some time, I became a good player. My family knew I liked to try new hobbies but then stop them, so they thought I would do the same with football. But I didn’t. I even dreamed of playing football professionally when I grew up. The chance came sooner than I thought. I played in local tournaments, and one referee saw that I was a good player. He told the manager of a women’s club to watch me play. After that, she asked me to join her club. I was surprised because I didn’t know young girls could join women’s clubs. But the manager liked me, and I started training with a big club when I was 13 years old. I got much better. Still, some people were not sure I would be a star player, which made me a little sad. But my coach told me to be myself and believe in myself. He even let me play in a championship match earlier than I thought I would! I ran very hard because I didn’t want to let my team down. Then, by chance, I scored the winning goal! Even with many people watching, I could hear my coach cheering for me. After the match, my team carried me around the field. It was amazing! Since then, I have scored many more winning goals! Next month, my coach and I are organizing a football tournament in my area. The goal is to get teenagers interested in football and to let them talk to other players in my club. They will see what it is like to be in a professional team and feel they can play for a top team if they work hard. My advice to them will be the same as my coach gave me – there will be good times and bad times too. I have had very few bad times, so I feel lucky!"

In the UK and around the world, there is a new idea in education. This idea encourages new students to start doing research early in their studies. Research is not just for famous scholars or scientists. It is a way for everyone to learn and build skills. Research skills are important for your studies and for jobs because they help you think about the world and your work.
As a student, you can help create knowledge. You do not just learn and repeat what others say; you ask questions. You wonder things like: Why? How? When? What does this mean? What if things were different? These questions are important for research.
Research can be very complex and done by experts, but it can also be simple. It starts with asking questions and looking for answers. Most students have done some research before. You have probably asked questions for school projects or at work. You have also done research when planning a holiday, growing plants, fixing things, training your dog, or shopping online.
In college and higher education, it is important to ask questions, think critically, and explore information. Some students may find this hard because in some cultures, knowledge is seen as fixed. They may think they should only listen to teachers and books. However, in many places like the UK, US, and Europe, it is okay to question what you learn and who teaches it.
Doing research can feel challenging. Critical thinking is very important. We should not just repeat what we read or hear. Instead, we need to think about it, test it, and see if it makes sense. We should not blindly trust everything we read or hear.

Cities have always been important places for ideas and discussions. In the 18th century, people in London met in coffee houses to talk about science and politics. In modern Paris, artist Pablo Picasso discussed art in cafés. However, living in a city can be difficult. The same cafés in London that encouraged conversation also helped spread diseases like cholera. Picasso eventually moved to the countryside. 
Today, cities are full of creativity, but they can also feel overwhelming. Scientists are studying how city life affects our brains, and the findings are surprising. It is known that city life can be tiring, but new research shows that living in a city can make it harder for us to think clearly. One reason for this is that cities lack nature, which is good for our brains. For example, studies show that hospital patients heal faster when they can see trees from their windows. Even small views of nature can help our brains relax from the busy city life.
More people now live in cities than in the countryside. Instead of having open spaces, we are surrounded by many people in concrete areas. This crowded environment can affect our mental and physical health and change how we think. When we walk in busy streets, our brains have to pay attention to many things, like other people and traffic. This constant need to focus can make us feel tired because it uses a lot of our brain's energy.
Natural places do not require as much focus. This idea is called attention restoration theory, created by psychologist Stephen Kaplan. He believed that being in nature can help our brains recover. Natural settings have things that catch our attention without causing stress, unlike loud noises like police sirens. This allows our minds to relax and recharge.
Long before scientists studied this, philosophers and landscape designers warned about the problems of city life and wanted to bring nature into cities. Parks, like Central Park in New York, give people a break from city life. A well-designed park can help our brains feel better quickly. While people have tried many ways to improve brain function, like energy drinks or changing office designs, walking in nature seems to be one of the best solutions.
Despite the mental challenges of city life, cities continue to grow. Research shows that the same crowded features of cities that can make it hard to focus also help create new ideas. The close social interactions in cities are important for creativity. Just like the crowded streets of 18th-century London led to new ideas, the busy environment of modern cities can also help people be creative. However, less crowded areas might not create as many new ideas over time. 
The challenge is to find ways to reduce the stress of city life while keeping its benefits. Sometimes, people feel tired of nature and want to be in the city again.

Where should we look for the mind? This question may seem strange because we usually think that thinking happens inside our heads. Today, we have advanced machines that can show us brain activity. However, I believe that studying the mind should not only focus on what is inside our heads. There is a lot of evidence from history that shows that objects and tools also help us think. For example, stone tools, jewelry, drawings, and writing have all played important roles in how humans have developed and how we think.
Many scientists study the mind by looking at people without the things they usually use. This is helpful for understanding the brain, but it can make us forget that we often think with the help of things around us. I do not want to say that the brain is not important, but I want to show that the mind is more than just the brain. It is useful to think about how human intelligence connects with culture and the things we use.
I have a new idea called Material Engagement Theory (MET). This theory looks at how objects can help us think. For example, when we make numbers from clay or use a stone to create a tool, these actions show how we use things to think. MET also studies how this has changed over time and what it means for our thinking.
Think about a blind person using a stick. Where does this person’s self begin? The blind person and the stick work together, showing that our minds and the things we use are connected. The stick helps the blind person feel and understand the world. The brain sees the stick as part of the body. This example reminds us that human intelligence can change and grow when we use new tools and technology.
I see the human mind as something that is always changing and developing. The stick, whether it is a simple tool or a smartphone, helps us explore and understand our environment. For humans, tools are not just for getting food; they help us learn and satisfy our curiosity. This special ability to use objects is why humans create things more than any other species. I call this ability metaplasticity, which means our minds can change as we interact with the world around us. 
MET helps us understand how different tools, from ancient stone tools to modern smartphones, can change who we are and how we think. Technology that changes our minds may sound like science fiction, but humans have been using it since we first appeared. 
**Questions:**
1. What is the main idea of the text?
2. What does the author believe about the mind and objects?
3. What is Material Engagement Theory (MET)?
4. How does the example of the blind person with a stick help explain the connection between the mind and objects?
5. What does the author mean by "metaplasticity"?

"Photography is one of the most important inventions that changed how we see the world. In the United States, photography became a big part of culture. It was used in many ways, like for science, industry, and art, and it also brought a lot of fun and entertainment with cameras. Historians believe that photography is one of the greatest contributions of the US to the visual arts. This is a strong statement, but it shows how important photography is in American culture. To understand its impact, we need to look at its beginnings in the mid-19th century.
Why was photography so popular? First, it was a new technology that people loved. Just like steam power and railroads made travel easier, photography brought images of the world into homes quickly. Second, people used cameras to show their identity and how they wanted to be seen. Third, cameras helped families keep memories, even if those memories were not always real. Finally, photographs showed real life, which matched the style of many American artists.
A photograph is a way to show something important. It tells us what the photographer wants us to see. Because photographs are made by machines, they are records of what was in front of the camera. This gives them a sense of truth. However, every photograph also shows the photographer's point of view. When we see a photo, we might think we understand it because we know the subject, but the meaning of a photograph can be more complicated.
Many things in a photograph do not explain themselves. We need to think about where we see the photo and what information comes with it, like captions in newspapers or how it is displayed in a gallery. To understand a photograph's history, we should ask why the photographer took it and how people first saw it. The same photo can mean different things in different places and times.
For a long time, the importance of the camera to artists was not well known. But now, many artists use photographs in their work. For example, Andy Warhol used photographs in his paintings. Today, photography is seen as an important part of art, not separate from painting, but a key part of how we represent things before cameras were invented."

In 1890, William James, an American philosopher and doctor, defined psychology as the "science of mental life." This definition helps us understand psychology even today. We all have a mental life, which means we have thoughts and feelings. Psychology can be studied in humans, rats, and monkeys, but it can be hard to understand. 
William James was especially interested in human psychology. He believed it includes basic elements: thoughts, feelings, and the physical world around us. Our knowledge about these things is personal and comes from our own experiences. Sometimes, we make judgments about psychology based on our own feelings. We act like amateur psychologists when we share our opinions about why people behave in certain ways, like feeling insulted or unhappy.
Problems can happen when two people understand things differently. Formal psychology tries to find methods to decide which explanations are correct in different situations. Psychologists help us tell the difference between our personal thoughts and scientific facts. Psychology is about the mind and brain. Although psychologists study the brain, they do not know everything about how it works. They learn more by studying our behavior and making guesses about what happens inside us.
Studying psychology is difficult because the mind cannot be seen like a machine. We can only understand it by looking at behavior. Psychology is like solving a crossword puzzle. It requires careful observation and logical thinking. Psychologists want to describe, understand, predict, and learn how to change the processes they study. When they achieve these goals, they can help us understand our experiences and improve people's lives.
Psychological findings have helped in many areas, like teaching children to read better, designing safer machines, and helping people express their feelings when they are sad. Although people have talked about psychological questions for a long time, scientific study of psychology has only happened in the last 150 years. Early psychologists used introspection, which means looking at one’s own thoughts and feelings, to find answers. While this is still interesting, it has limitations. 
William James said that trying to understand the mind through introspection is like trying to see in the dark. Today, psychologists prefer to base their theories on careful observations of others' behavior instead of just their own experiences.

In a storehouse in a business park in Michigan, USA, there is a special place called the Museum of Failed Products. This museum has many products that people did not want to buy. Some examples are A Touch of Yogurt shampoo and Breakfast Cola. The museum is owned by a company called GfK. Carol Sherry, who runs the museum, believes that each product has a sad story about the people who tried to sell it.
The museum is surprising because it makes money. Many companies do not keep samples of their failed products. Robert McMath, who started the museum, wanted to collect new products, not just the ones that failed. He began this in the 1960s. He learned that most products fail. Because he collected many new products, most of them were unsuccessful.
Today, many products in the museum show how people often think positively. They believe that new products will be successful, even when they are not. Sometimes, marketers spend more money on a product that is not selling well, hoping to make it successful. They do not want to talk about why the product failed.
This positive thinking is also common in self-help ideas. One popular idea is "positive visualization," which means imagining good outcomes. Some scientists believe that our brains are made to see things positively. Research shows that people who think too positively may not be as motivated to reach their goals. For example, people who think they will have a great week at work may actually do less well.
Psychologist Carol Dweck says that how we see failure depends on our beliefs about ability. Some people think ability is something you are born with, while others believe it can grow with effort. People who think ability is fixed feel very bad about failure. For example, a sports star who thinks he is a natural talent may not practice enough and then fail. On the other hand, people who believe ability can grow see failure as a chance to learn and improve. Dweck compares this to weight training: muscles get stronger when they are pushed to their limits. Having a growth mindset is a happier way to live, whether or not it leads to success.

Everyone knows that sports teams have an advantage when they play at home. But why is this? Many people think they know the answer, but professional sports are changing quickly, and what we thought was true is now being questioned. Two main reasons for this are science and money. Sports scientists want to understand what helps players do their best, and they have many ideas about home advantage. At the same time, people who invest money in sports want to know why home advantage is important. If players are paid enough, shouldn’t they feel comfortable playing anywhere?
What about the fans? Would it matter if a team like Manchester United played some of their home games far away, like in Asia, to reach more fans? It would matter to British fans who believe their team needs their support and loyalty. Fans often think that the order of events explains what happens. For example, when a team plays well, the home fans cheer loudly, and sometimes this leads to a goal. Fans remember the times they cheered and a goal was scored, but they forget the many times when their cheering did not lead to a goal.
There is one idea that seems to be supported by science. Home fans not only cheer for their team but also direct their noise at the referee. In a famous study, referees listened to a recording of a match. Some heard the crowd cheering, while others heard a silent version. The referees who heard the crowd were less likely to call fouls against the home team. This shows that referees try to avoid making calls that would upset the home crowd.
Recent studies show that home advantage has decreased in many sports, but not as much as expected. For example, in the early years of the Football League in England, home teams won about 70% of the points, but now they win about 60%. One reason for this change is travel. In the past, traveling was hard, but now players travel in comfort. Stadiums also look more similar now, which may affect home advantage.
Different sports have different levels of home advantage. Basketball has the most home advantage, followed by football, while baseball has the least. This might be because baseball is more about individual players, while team sports like basketball depend on teamwork. In basketball, players feel more confident when they play at home, which helps them work together better.
Another interesting finding is that players have higher testosterone levels before home games. This may be linked to a natural desire to protect their home ground. In recent Rugby World Cup games, underdog teams won at home against stronger teams, showing the power of home advantage. As one referee said, "It’s the law of the jungle out there."

"‘The more I practice, the luckier I get,’ said golfer Gary Player many years ago. This saying is famous in sports and is important for many athletes and their coaches. It is easy to understand why. First, many people argue about who really said it first. Second, the meaning is not clear. Player did not mean lucky in a real way; he was being ironic. His real message was: ‘The more I practice, the better I get.’ 
This idea connects to a big question: Is talent something you are born with, or can you learn it? Many people believe that practice is more important than natural talent. Psychologist Anders Ericsson is known for saying that you need 10,000 hours of practice to become an expert in anything. His idea has inspired many books, like Malcolm Gladwell’s Outliers, and others like Talent Is Overrated. These books say that practice is the most important thing to become good at something.
However, author Epstein argues that this is not always true. He points out a problem in studies about successful people: they often only look at those who are already excellent. He asks if there are other ways to understand why some people are good at things and others are not. Epstein travels around the world to find answers, from Kenya to Sweden and even to Alaska. In Alaska, he learns that the drive of sled dogs might be important in races, showing that both genes and choices matter.
Epstein believes that both nature (genes) and nurture (environment) are important for elite athletes. He thinks that if Usain Bolt had grown up in the US, he might have been a good basketball player instead of the fastest man in the world. But he also shows that sometimes genes are very important. He asks why we separate men and women in sports if only practice matters. Sometimes, the best questions are the simplest."

A recent report shows that many children in rich countries feel lonely and unhappy. Jay Griffiths asks a simple question: why are children today so sad? In her new book, Kith, Griffiths explains that these children spend too much time indoors, looking at screens like TVs and computers. They have lost touch with nature, like forests, mountains, and rivers. She believes this is a big part of the problem.
A follow-up study talked to some children to understand their feelings better. The children did not say they wanted more technology. Many said they would be happier if they could go outside more. Older people often remember their childhoods fondly, saying they had more freedom. They spent their summers exploring, swimming, and building forts. They think this was better and healthier than how children live today. However, they often forget that they created the rules that keep their children safe, like not allowing them to play in old sheds.
Griffiths’ book has many strong opinions. She talks about how parents worry about dangers outside and how this fear helps companies sell toys and gadgets to keep children entertained at home. She also discusses how some people give medicine to children who are restless or make them wear goggles for playground games. It is unclear how common these rules are, but Griffiths expresses her anger about them.
While her ideas are interesting, Griffiths sometimes goes too far. She compares how we treat children today to racism, which seems extreme. She has a very positive view of children, saying they are creative thinkers. However, this view may not match reality, especially when dealing with energetic young children.
One important idea in the book is that children should be allowed to explore and take risks. Griffiths believes that children need to experience small accidents to learn how to stay safe. She says, “Children need accidents,” which helps them avoid bigger problems later. However, she does not explain how to create these small accidents safely. Also, not all children want to explore the wild. What about the shy or cautious children? Perhaps the real issue is that we try to make all children fit into the same mold, whether we keep them inside or push them outside. 
**Questions:**
1. What do many children in rich countries feel, according to the report?
2. What does Jay Griffiths think is a big problem for children today?
3. What did the follow-up study find about what children want?
4. How do older people remember their childhoods?
5. What does Griffiths say children need to learn about safety?
6. Why might Griffiths' views be seen as too extreme?

I am a bio-psychologist with a PhD, which means I have studied a lot. I am good at solving problems in my work and in life, but this is not just because of my education. Many problems in life cannot be solved with complicated formulas or answers we learn in school. They need good judgment, wisdom, and creativity that come from life experiences. For children, these experiences happen during play.
My recent research is about how important play is for children’s growth. All mammals, including humans, play when they are young. Animals that need to learn more play the most. For example, meat-eating animals play more than plant-eating animals because hunting is harder to learn than eating grass. Primates, like monkeys and apes, play more than other mammals because they need to learn more.
Children, who have a lot to learn, play more than any other young primates when they can. Play is how adults and mammals have always learned. The most important skills children need to live happy and good lives are not taught in school. These skills are learned and practiced through play. They include thinking creatively, getting along with others, working together, and controlling their feelings.
Creativity is very important for success. We do not need people who just follow instructions or do simple calculations. We need people who can ask new questions and solve new problems. If we can help people think ahead and find solutions, we will have a strong workforce. But this needs creative thinking. Creative people often have a playful mind.
Some adults, called geniuses, keep their childlike ability to think creatively. Albert Einstein said that school almost made him lose his interest in math and science, but he found it again after leaving school. He called his creative work “combinatorial play.” He imagined chasing a sunbeam and thought about what would happen.
We cannot teach creativity, but school can take it away by focusing on questions that have only one right answer. It is also very important to get along with others, care for them, and work together. Children are born wanting to play with others, and through play, they learn social skills and fairness, which they need for life.
Play is voluntary, which means players can stop whenever they want. If you cannot stop, it is not play. Players know they must keep each other happy to keep the game going. This freedom makes play a very fair activity.
School has become harder: there are fewer breaks, more homework, and more pressure for good grades. Organized sports have taken the place of free play. “Play dates” with adults have replaced unsupervised play, and adults often feel they must step in instead of letting children solve their own problems. These changes have happened slowly but are very big. They are caused by many social factors, like parents’ fears, warnings about dangers, and the idea that children learn more from adults than from each other.
Our children do not need more school. They need more play. If we care about our children and the future, we must change the bad trend of the last fifty years. We must give childhood back to children. They should be allowed to play and explore so they can grow into strong adults ready for an uncertain future.

In many countries, more young people in their twenties are using social media to find jobs. Websites like Twitter and LinkedIn help them connect directly with employers. This is easier than the old way of standing outside an office with a sign that says "hire me." But using social media can also lead to mistakes.
For example, a young man in the US tried to connect with a senior marketing executive on LinkedIn. He thought she could help him find a job because she knew many important people. However, she was upset that he asked her to share her contacts. She rejected his request and sent a very rude message that many people saw online. People were shocked by her message, and she might regret how she wrote it. But if this makes young people think more about how to use social media for work, it could help them.
Social media can be risky for job seekers who do not know how to use it well. Many young people have used sites like Facebook and Twitter for fun for a long time. When older generations were teenagers, social media was a way to escape from parents and teachers. It was a place to show off and be creative. You could talk to someone online for hours and then ignore them at school. You could also change how you looked online with pictures and songs.
However, using social media for work is very different. Some young people do not see this difference. They may think that being bold and confident online is still a good idea. Just because many people liked your posts on Facebook does not mean you can impress employers on LinkedIn. Young people need to understand that what they learned about social media as teenagers does not work for jobs. They must meet employers' expectations to succeed in the job market.
One common complaint from employers is that young job seekers are too casual and seem arrogant. This makes older people think young people feel entitled. In reality, many young people are worried about finding jobs, which is why they use social media. This impression of arrogance can hurt their chances, even if they have the skills to be good workers.
So, how should you contact someone on a professional networking site? First, clearly say who you are and explain how you can help them. Maybe you can offer to do some research for them. This way, you have a better chance of getting a helpful reply. Avoid sending the same message to many people, and keep your tone polite to make a good impression. Remember, social media can help you make important connections, but you need to use it carefully to avoid problems.

It is hard to say what will happen to newspapers in the future. Many people think newspapers are in trouble. Since 2000, the number of people reading UK national newspapers has dropped by a lot, between one-third and one-half. In the USA, a study shows that only 26 percent of people get their news from newspapers now, down from 45 percent in 2001. Some people believe that printed newspapers will disappear in the next 15 years. 
However, history shows that old forms of media often survive. For example, in 1835, a journalist said that books and theatre were finished and that newspapers would be the most important source of news. But theatre survived, even with the rise of cinema and television. Radio is still popular today, and cinema has also done well against videos and DVDs. Even vinyl records are coming back, with online sales increasing a lot since 2008.
Newspapers were once a new form of media too. It took a long time for them to become the main source of news. This happened because it became easier to share news with many people thanks to new technology in the 19th century, like the steam press and the telegraph. People also started to think that they needed to know what was happening around them more often. In the past, people only noticed changes in the seasons or big disasters like floods or diseases.
Before the 19th century, journalism was not a job that many people could do for a living. There was no strong need for news every day or week. Sometimes, having newspapers published regularly can be a problem. Now, people can read news online whenever they want. They can choose what news is important to them. When big news happens, online news can be updated very quickly. Mistakes can be fixed right away, and people can read full documents related to the news.
This is very different from how newspapers work. However, many news providers focus on being the first to share news instead of helping people understand it better. In the past, news was shared in busy places like markets or taverns, where truth mixed with rumors. Today, it seems like we are going back to that way of sharing news. Newspapers have not always done a good job of explaining how the world works. They might disappear, or they might find a way to help us understand things better in this chaotic world. 
**Questions:**
1. What has happened to the number of people reading UK national newspapers since 2000?
2. What percentage of US citizens get their news from newspapers now?
3. What did a journalist say in 1835 about newspapers and theatre?
4. What technology helped newspapers become popular in the 19th century?
5. How can people read news online differently than in newspapers?

Humans are not really at home under the moon and stars. We are used to the sun’s light. This is part of our nature, even if we do not think about it. Because of this, we have changed the night by adding light. This is similar to building a dam in a river. But this change has problems, called light pollution. Scientists are just starting to study light pollution. 
Light pollution happens because of bad lighting design. This means that artificial light shines into the sky instead of down where it is needed. Bad lighting makes the night bright, changing the light levels that many living things, including us, are used to. When man-made light spreads into nature, it affects many things like migration, reproduction, and feeding.
A long time ago, the term ‘light pollution’ did not exist. Imagine walking towards London on a moonlit night in 1800. At that time, nearly a million people lived there, using candles and lanterns. There were only a few gas-lit houses, and no public gaslights in the streets for another seven years. From far away, you would smell London more than see its dim light.
We have brightened the night as if it were empty, but many animals are active at night. Light is very strong and attracts many species. For example, birds can be drawn to bright lights and circle around them until they fall. Birds that migrate at night can crash into tall buildings that are brightly lit. Some birds, like blackbirds and nightingales, sing at strange times because of artificial light.
At first, people thought light pollution only bothered astronomers, who need to see the stars clearly. But we all need darkness. Without it, our bodies do not work well, which can cause health problems. The way we wake and sleep is connected to the light and dark on Earth. Changing this can be harmful to us.
In the end, humans are affected by light pollution just like frogs near a bright highway. By living in our own bright world, we have lost touch with our history and the natural rhythms of day and night. Light pollution makes us forget our true place in the universe and the beauty of a dark night with the stars above.

The leader of a big company recently said that his company will not keep track of how much paid holiday time employees take. This idea came from a smaller internet company that has a similar policy. The leader said he got the idea from a happy email from his daughter. In the email, she sounds like a writer from her father’s company. 
Some people think this announcement is just a way to make the company seem friendly, but we should ask: is this idea practical? The internet company has 2,000 employees and offers one service, while the big company has 50,000 employees and many different services like finance, transport, and healthcare. The idea of “take as much time off as you want” seems better for a smaller company where workers know each other’s jobs well. In a big company, it is harder to know if taking time off will hurt the business.
The leader of the big company said employees can take as much leave as they want, but they must be sure that their work is up to date and that their absence will not hurt the business or their careers. But is it really possible to be that sure? No matter how much work you finish before a holiday, there will always be more work when you return. This means that workers might feel guilty about taking time off, which can lead to stress. If workers do not take enough leave, it can make them less productive over time.
There can also be pressure from coworkers about who is taking time off and for how long. In many companies, there is a culture of working late, which can make it hard for workers to take holidays. If workers feel they cannot take their leave, they might feel lazy or worry about their jobs. This could lead to a situation where workers do not take their entitled leave, or they might still follow the old rules about leave, making the new policy useless.
Modern technology makes it easy to receive work messages anytime, which can mix work and free time. The internet company started their unlimited leave policy because employees wanted to know how to balance this new way of working with the old rules about time off. But if there are no set working hours, it can feel like every hour is a working hour. Employees might feel like their work hours are always being watched, which can make them feel stressed.
Employment laws exist for a reason. Workers have the right to a minimum amount of paid leave because rest and free time are important for their health. The benefits of the unlimited leave policy, like better morale and creativity, can happen without harming worker well-being. So, I am not sure if allowing workers to take as much holiday as they want is really the goal or the result of this policy.

Peer review is when experts check a scientific research paper before it is published. This process is important because it helps to make sure that only good quality papers are published. However, reviewing a paper can take a long time, sometimes up to a year. Is this delay worth it? Some people think it is, and some do not. 
Many scientists still believe in peer review, but things are changing. More researchers are using preprints, which are drafts of papers shared online before they are reviewed. Preprints help scientists share new results quickly so others can read and discuss them. 
Publishing in journals has become more about gaining fame and advancing careers. This can lead to problems, as some scientists may cut corners to get published in top journals. Reviewers often focus on whether a paper is good enough for a specific journal instead of just checking its quality. 
There are issues with the current system, but many people are hesitant to change it. However, some scientists, like Ron Vale, believe that preprints could help. Even though preprints have been around for twenty years, not everyone uses them. Some scientists worry that journals will not accept papers that have been shared as preprints. They also fear that publishing without peer review could lead to poor-quality science. 
But preprints allow for immediate feedback from a global community of reviewers. For example, Tanya Elks, a psychology professor, shared her paper as a preprint. This way, the original authors could respond to her critique, and everyone could see the discussion. If a paper is rejected by a journal, the preprint and comments are still available, so the work is not wasted.
Preprint archives allow scientists to have discussions that used to happen only between a few people. They can also share negative results, which are important but often ignored by journals that focus only on new discoveries. Papers on preprint archives are read and cited more often, showing that sharing research this way is effective. By using the internet's openness, preprints can help scientists focus on the quality of their work, not just where it is published.
**Questions:**
1. What is peer review?
2. Why can reviewing a paper take a long time?
3. What are preprints?
4. How do preprints help scientists?
5. What is one problem with publishing in top journals?
6. What did Tanya Elks do with her paper?
7. Why are negative results important in science?
8. How do preprints affect the number of times papers are read?

When I ask my students what a poem is, they often say, "a painting in words." But this answer does not make me or them happy. One day, I asked a group of students to pick an object and write two paragraphs about it. One paragraph was to describe the object like a scientist, and the other was to write from the object's point of view, calling it "Poem." One student wrote: 
**Poem**  
I may look strange or scary, but I help people breathe. I am used only in emergencies and for a short time. Most people will never need to use me. The object? An oxygen mask. This choice helped the class understand how poetry works in a unique way. The exercise was fun and led to good discussions.
When I was in school, poetry was confusing for me. I thought every poem was a silly puzzle that made it hard to understand feelings. After school, many people care less about poetry. Sometimes, you see a poem, and it stands out because it is not like regular writing. It challenges you to read it, but often you feel let down because it is boring or hard to understand. Still, you feel good for trying.
What do we want to find in poems? A poem can show deep feelings, beautiful images, or clever thoughts. But if we want tears, we watch movies. For information, we read articles. Novels take us to different worlds, and music is hard to beat with its mix of words and sounds. 
However, poems can be useful because they can be unclear. Everyday life is full of uncertainty, unlike reading sentences. But this does not tell us what a poem really is. If you look up "poem" online, it says it is a type of art that uses the beauty and rhythm of language. This is a fancy way to explain it, but the word "poem" comes from Greek, meaning "a thing made." A poet is someone who makes things. 
So, if a poem is a "thing made," what kind of thing is it? Some poets say poems are like wild animals – hard to control – or like machines – made with care. But these comparisons do not always work. The best part of trying to define a poem is the discussion it creates. Whether you see a poem as a machine or a wild animal, this can change how you think about both. It can help you see everyday things in a new way.
A poem is not hard to understand, especially when we think about how song lyrics can stick in our minds. The mix of words and music is powerful, like the saying, "Sticks and stones may break my bones, but words can never hurt me." But sometimes, words can hurt. Think about a poem in a newspaper or magazine. A poem can touch you deeply, even though it looks like regular writing. 
What about the empty space around the poem? This space could be used for a longer article or an ad. A poem is written and rewritten like an article or story, but it is not just made to sell. Publishers send out poetry books, but they do not expect them to make money. A poem is not just for the market; it is special on its own. Because of its unique place in a magazine or book, a poem can still surprise us, even if just for a moment.

I bought my first metal detector soon after I got married. £70 was a lot of money then, and I could have spent it on something useful for the house. But my wife, Marion, was impressed when I found a gold ring worth £80 on my first trip. Over the years, every brooch and coin I found made me happy. I liked feeling connected to the past. After the gold ring, it took 40 years before I found something that impressed Marion again.
One dull February afternoon, I had a couple of hours to search. It was raining, so I went to a nearby place where I knew there was old farming equipment. The first time my detector beeped, I found a piece of a metal wheel. Then it beeped again. I tried to ignore it, but I had to check. I dug down half a meter and was lying in the mud when I saw a round, golden ball. I had found brass curtain rails before, so I tried not to get my hopes up. But as I cleaned it, I saw it was a beautiful, thick loop.
I remembered seeing something like this before - the Great Torc, in the British Museum. It is a famous piece from Iron Age Britain, over 2,000 years ago. A torc is a beautiful necklace made of gold and silver. Each end has a gold ring like the one I found. I took it to my car. On the way home, I kept looking at the torc on the seat next to me. I washed it in my kitchen sink, which was probably the only clean it had since ancient times.
“Marion!” I shouted, “I have something for you.” I was still looking at my find when my wife came into the room and stopped. “What is it?” she asked. I told her it was a very old and rare piece of jewelry. We didn’t try it on because we didn’t want to damage it. At bedtime, I hid it in our wardrobe. I was worried about it being stolen, so I got up and hid it under a floorboard in my office.
The law says I must report such finds to the authorities within 14 days. I wanted to enjoy the torc as much as I could before I gave it up. I even took it in a plastic bag to show a friend in the hospital. Finally, I took it to the council office in the same bag. The registrar was talking to someone when I placed the torc on his desk. He turned around and stopped talking. The torc was confirmed as real and was sold to my local council. It is now in the British Museum in London. I received £350,000, which was shared between the owner of the field and me. 
But the torc is more than just money. It is something I have saved for the nation. People say to me, “Now that you found something so amazing, will you stop detecting?” But the brooches and coins are still interesting to me. Besides, if a fisherman catches a big fish, he doesn’t stop fishing - not while there is a chance to catch a bigger fish tomorrow.

Sleeping is one of my favorite things about traveling, but I don’t talk about it much because I feel a bit guilty. When my friends tell me about their busy trips, with every moment planned for activities like visiting museums or hiking, I just smile and don’t say much. What would they think if they knew that my travel plans have big empty spaces for naps in the afternoon and lazy mornings in nice beds? Sleeping better is one of the good things about traveling. 
When I went to Mexico’s Yucatán coast in my early 20s, I was surprised by how many hours I spent sleeping—more than 12 hours most days. There were many loud birds nearby, but it didn’t bother me. Far from home, with new smells and sounds, I could sleep deeply and have many dreams. Without alarm clocks and responsibilities, I could sleep more easily. 
I think sleep is not just a break from traveling; it is part of the travel experience. When we travel, we see, hear, and smell new things. All these new experiences fill us up. When we sleep, we process all this new information. It makes sense that sleep feels different when we are traveling. 
People often worry about jet lag, but I think the problems I have after long trips are more about getting used to new places than about time changes. For example, in Trinidad, people wake up very early to avoid the heat, feel tired around 10 a.m. when the sun is strong, and then feel active again in the cool evening. Even though Trinidad is only one hour ahead of New York, it takes me days to get used to the different sleep patterns. When I finally adjust, I feel like I have really arrived.
I remember one afternoon in Santo Domingo, the capital of the Dominican Republic. I had a big lunch with new friends in an apartment with a view of the blue Caribbean Sea. After eating, we all felt sleepy, and the conversation slowed down. One by one, my friends left the table to lie down on hammocks and sofas. I understood why they had so many pillows on the floor. I took some pillows and joined them. I had heard about the Latin American custom of the siesta, but that day I really experienced it. I shared not just sleep, but a part of Dominican life.
Travel sleep is special because I remember it. In a new place, I enjoy the different smells, textures, and sounds while I sleep. If enjoying every moment of travel is what makes a good traveler today, then sleeping is one of the best ways to do that. Maybe I should not feel embarrassed about my love for sleep and tell my busy friends that travel sleep is an important part of traveling too.

The woman turned away from the mirror. “What do you think? Please be honest.” Mia picked up a medium-sized hat. It was soft and had a pretty layer of gauze and a silk bow. “I still think this one looks best on you,” she said to her customer politely. The woman wrinkled her nose and made a funny face. “But it is so boring,” she said. “Every other woman will wear a hat like that at my daughter’s wedding. This pretty little hat will make me stand out.” She patted the red and black mini top hat on her head. “Yes,” she said firmly, “this is the one I want.” Mia smiled and agreed that the woman would stand out at her daughter’s wedding. She thought of her own daughter, Jen. It was Jen’s thirtieth birthday today, and they were having a family get-together. It had been a while since they had all been together, and Mia was excited to see Jen, Dan, and Luke. She was also looking forward to meeting Jen’s friend, Tattie. They did not know anything about Tattie. Mia’s husband, Jeff, had quickly pointed this out when Jen called last week. “Tattie? What kind of name is that?” Jeff had said. “It’s short for Tatiana,” Mia replied. “I think it’s nice.” “It sounds strange,” Jeff said. He did not like anything fancy or showy. He also did not like Mia’s way of being polite. He would have told the woman in the shop that she was choosing the wrong hat. He might have said that a dustbin lid would look better on her. “The problem with you, Mia,” he often said, “is that you are too polite.” 
An hour later, Mia closed her shop and went in the back door of Medlar House. It took her only forty seconds to get home from work. Four years ago, when Luke, their youngest child, left home, Mia had the idea to turn the unused barn next to the house into a space for her business. Jeff was not sure. “Do you really think people want to buy hats?” he asked. Mia knew that many friends had trouble finding the perfect hat for special occasions. She was right. From the first day, after Jen helped her make a website, Mia’s Hats was a success. Women came from far away to her shop in Little Pelham. In a friendly place, she let them try on many hats until they found the right one. She encouraged her customers to bring their outfits so they could match everything. Recently, she started selling handbags and costume jewelry too.

It is a long way from London to Atlanta. In his new home in America, Lawrence Okoye thinks about his amazing sports journey. He is very confident but is also surprised by how far he has come. He went from being in an Olympic final in discus throwing to possibly playing American football. Lawrence has never played American football before, but he might be chosen for one of the big teams in the USA.
In Atlanta, Lawrence is learning about his new position in football. It is surprising that a 21-year-old from London could be picked for one of the biggest teams in American sports. But Lawrence likes to prove people wrong. He was offered a place at Oxford University to study law, but he decided to train seriously for discus throwing instead. He had played rugby before. In just 20 months, he became the fourth-best discus thrower in the world.
Lawrence came to Atlanta to train for discus throwing in warm weather. He wanted to prepare for the world championships. When asked about his chance to get a big NFL contract, he said, “American football was in my mind, but I only decided to try it when I got to the USA.” He had thought about it while in school, but it seemed like a crazy idea then. After arriving in America, he saw that there were trials for the NFL in Atlanta. Even though he had never played before, he thought he could be good enough to attend the trials. “Pretty much,” he said. “I went on the site and applied.”
Was he nervous about being tested with players who had played football all their lives? “No,” he said. “I don’t get nervous for many things.” He does not talk a lot, but he believes in his abilities. The results from his tests showed that he was the best player. “I was very happy to hear that,” he said, showing some pride.
However, he is also careful. He has no experience in football. How can he make it into an NFL team? “The coaches say I have what I need. It’s about how hard I work,” he replied. Will he be calm while waiting to hear if he has been chosen? “I will be. There’s no pressure on me. Many people say I will be selected, but I’m not too worried.”
This calmness might come from his bad experience in the Olympic discus final when he came last. He has moved on from that and is happy that he qualified for the final with a great last throw. “That was an amazing day,” he said. “The final didn’t go as I wanted, but that’s part of sports. I can go back to it.”
After his Olympic disappointment, some people thought he would not do well again. Lawrence does not want to talk about that. An NFL player’s minimum salary is over $400,000 a year, so there is a lot of money to be made. Lawrence has changed from rugby to athletics and now to American football. With all his talent, wouldn’t it be better to focus on just one sport? “I understand why someone would say that,” he replied. “I want to achieve something I have dreamed about since I was a kid. If it doesn’t work out, I can go back to discus, the sport I love. Every decision I’ve made has been thought out.”

'We had been flying east all night, and I woke up to see that it was already morning. Looking out of the window, I saw the empty land below. The dark brown and green colors made me feel better. It was mid-September, but it was still summer in Siberia. I could see no people, just mountains, rivers, and forests going to the far horizon. I shook my head. My neighbor woke up and smiled at me. “Good morning, Robert,” he said with a slow, Russian accent. Sergei was a salesman from Moscow. He was flying to sell safety clothes to the local mines. His English was not very good, and my Russian was not good either. But with a dictionary, I told him I was going to the city of Magadan in Siberia with a one-way ticket because I wanted to ride my bicycle back home to England. “But, Robert,” he said, “there is no road from Magadan; you cannot ride a bicycle.” I told him I thought there was a road, but not many people used it. “Alone?” he asked, pointing at me. “No, I will ride with a friend named Al.” “Just one friend?” “Yes, just one,” I nodded. Sergei still looked unsure and pointed outside, saying “Holodna” (cold). I tried to show him with my hands that I had warm clothes, but I didn’t say that I was on a tight budget. Most of my clothes were bought at low prices. I was not sure if they would be good enough. This was especially true for my big over-trousers that I bought for £10. 
It all started in a lecture hall in Scotland. The hall was full of tired students. Some were taking notes without energy. The teacher was talking on and on. I was thinking about a question. Should I ask him or not? “Well, why not?” I took a fresh sheet of paper and wrote, “Hi Al, Do you want to cycle across the Karakorum Highway between Pakistan and China this summer? Rob.” In front of me was Al, my old school friend. I tapped him on the shoulder and passed the note. He tried to read my handwriting, wrote something, and passed it back. I opened it and held my breath while I read. “OK,” it said. Six years later, I was going to meet Al in Siberia. I had been working as a geography teacher. The job was often hard, but it was never boring, and I had long holidays to go on adventures. Twice since I started teaching, I had used these holidays to meet Al. He had caught the adventure spirit after our bike ride in Pakistan and decided to cycle around the world. Since our first ride, Al had taken on bigger and bigger challenges. This trip around the world by bike was his biggest yet. Sometimes he thought the ride would be too hard for him. Even though it sounded tough, I envied him. He was having an amazing adventure and facing new challenges every day. He was proving wrong the people who said he could not do it. He was doing something that scared him almost every day, and it made him feel alive.'

In The Red Bull Air Race, twelve pilots race through tall pylons that are between 15 and 25 metres high. They make sharp turns, do barrel rolls, and fly in loops at speeds up to 370 km per hour. I was invited to experience what it is like to fly in this race. 
An hour before my flight, I had to sign two forms. The first form said I was healthy, and the second said I would empty my pockets. Small objects can be dangerous during the flight. I learned that I needed to keep my eyes on the horizon. The pilot would tell me where to look. I also had to promise to relax and enjoy the view when I was upside down.
Half an hour before the flight, I had a safety talk. I was told not to touch anything during the flight. When we started moving down the runway, I was very nervous. I had to keep my legs up and not touch the important pedals and switches. I knew I should stay calm, but I was scared.
The pilot, Dario, and I were in a very fast acrobatic plane called the Zivko Edge 540. When the plane took off, we quickly turned to the right. I felt the air push out of my lungs. I looked at the horizon and held my breath as I sank into my seat. For a moment, I felt much heavier than normal. Then we flew straight again. We turned left and dived down, making my stomach feel funny. 
We flew very close to the ground, between two pylons, at 400 km per hour. I was excited but also scared. For two minutes, I got to fly the plane, but my hands were shaking. Dario then did a barrel roll, which is a full turn in the air. He asked if I was okay, and I said yes. He asked if I had enough, and I said no, even though I was scared. Then he did a loop, flying up and over in a circle.
Many people would find this fun, like riding a rollercoaster. But I thought it was too much. At the top of the loop, I heard a voice telling me to relax and look up. I looked up and saw fields. The flight was over in 10 minutes. It was easier than what the pilots usually do in the race. When we landed, Dario ate sandwiches, but I didn’t eat for hours. That night, I dreamed about flying in loops over and over again.
**Questions:**
1. How many pilots race in The Red Bull Air Race?
2. What do pilots have to do with their pockets before the flight?
3. What did the pilot tell the writer to look at during the flight?
4. What is the name of the plane they flew in?
5. How long did the flight last?

Doug Allan films wild animals in cold places. If you have seen amazing videos of polar bears in a nature documentary, he probably filmed them. He says his favorite temperature is -18°C. Allan trained as a marine biologist and a diver. Diving was his first love, and he learned how to survive in cold places. His big chance came when a TV crew came to Antarctica, where he was working, to make a wildlife documentary. He helped the crew find different places to film. After 48 hours, he realized that being a wildlife cameraman was perfect for him: he could travel, have adventures, and dive underwater.
Now, he is a top cameraman and has worked on many important TV wildlife shows. He started working 35 years ago when not many people had been to Antarctica. There were people who filmed coral, elephants, and chimpanzees, but he became known as the "cold man." He felt that many amazing scenes were waiting to be filmed. When he started, the camera and technology were very simple. He says, "It is much easier to film today. In the past, if you filmed something, you had to remember it. Now, with digital cameras, you can see what you filmed right away. You used to think a lot about what shots you needed next. Film was very expensive, but now you can film a lot."
Allan says his experience in cold places is very valuable. He has spent so much time on sea ice that it feels normal to him. He does get cold toes, but he thinks the poles are healthy places because there are no leeches, diseases, or mosquitoes. Wildlife filming has many successes, but also failures. Once, he was in the Orkneys to film kittiwakes, but he could not tell which birds they were.
Recently, Allan got permission to film in Kong Karls Land, a group of islands in the Arctic Ocean. He knew it would be hard. It is a place for polar bears and is very dangerous. In April, it is usually -32°C, and the wind is strong. Carrying cameras in deep snow is very difficult. After walking for five hours a day and watching polar bear dens for 23 days, he had only seen one mother bear and her cub. But on day 24, he felt like he was part of the bear world. He said, "We find a new hole and wait. We move around to stay warm. After five hours of watching, I see something very quickly. I almost miss it, but my camera is ready. I see a black nose, then a head, and soon a mother bear is resting in front of the hole. She looks at me but does not care. Just then, she slides down the slope, and I think she is having fun." Then, two cubs appeared at the den entrance. "It is their first view of the world, and we have front-row seats."
Now, Allan wants to make his own film about climate change in the Arctic. He wants to talk to the people who live there and see how it affects their lives. He believes he can make an amazing documentary.

In 2004, Pen Hadow was the first person to walk to the North Pole alone without getting more supplies on the way. He had to swim in very cold water, deal with frostbite, and be careful of polar bears. Eight months later, he also reached the South Pole. Now, he is back in the Arctic, getting ready for a new adventure that is even bigger. Explorers like Pen are confident and determined. This time, there is a lot at stake. Pen and two friends will go on a three-month journey of 1,000 kilometers to the North Pole. They will measure the thickness and density of the ice. No one has done this before, and Pen knows the results will be very important for scientists. This will show what global warming is doing to the ice in the polar region.
Pen was prepared for this job since he was a child. His father’s old nanny, who worked for the famous polar explorer Scott of the Antarctic, took care of him. She made him tough by sending him out into storms with very few clothes. His father also loved adventures in the cold, and Pen became very strong. Pen is married to Mary, who loves horses. She helps him with his polar guide business and worries more about him when he is at home. She says, “He is in more danger driving because he thinks he is in the Arctic.”
For fun, Mary once raced against Pen in a famous mountain event where people on horseback race against people on foot. Mary and her horse finished an hour before Pen. They live in the countryside with their two children. Pen says, “It is harder to be away from them this time.” When he last went to the Arctic, his son was one year old and his daughter was five. He told his son, “You are the man of the house now, look after your mum and sister.” His son took this seriously and asked his mum how she was all the time, but it became too much for him. Pen thinks it was not fair to say that. 
For this trip, he plans to have very little contact with his family. He says, “If you call them, you remind them how far away you are.” In the days before he leaves, he is getting his equipment ready. He says, “Out on the ice, it is very hard to fix things.” He will be with Ann Daniels, a top polar explorer, and Martin Hartley, the expedition photographer. They will have a team of six people to help them by flying in supplies.
